context_bundle.summary: MongoDB document-oriented NoSQL database: JSON-like BSON documents in collections. Schema-flexible. Indexing: single-field, compound, text, geospatial. Aggregation pipeline: $match, $group, $project, $sort, $lookup (join). Sharding for horizontal scaling. Replication for HA (replica sets). Atlas (managed). Use cases: flexible schemas, rapid prototyping, hierarchical data, real-time analytics. Avoid: complex transactions (use Postgres), rigid schemas.

onboarding.quick_start: MongoDB basics: Collections (like tables), documents (JSON-like). Insert: db.users.insertOne({'email': 'john@example.com', 'age': 30}). Query: db.users.find({'age': {$gt: 18}}). Index: db.users.createIndex({'email': 1}), compound: {email: 1, created_at: -1}. Aggregation: db.orders.aggregate([{$match: {status: 'shipped'}}, {$group: {_id: '$user_id', total: {$sum: '$amount'}}}]). Sharding: shard by _id or custom key. Replication: replica sets for HA. Atlas: managed cloud MongoDB. Use for: flexible schemas, rapid iteration, hierarchical data. Avoid for: complex joins, ACID transactions (use Postgres).
common_patterns: Replica set: 3+ nodes for HA, automatic failover
